Coming out of the pandemic the Halifax International Airport Authority needed data-driven insights to navigate the recovery phase. Initially the airport struggled with unreliable dashboards from a professional service company before establishing a data analytics program. I join Rebecca Knight and Bob Laliberte, hosts of theCube, where we discuss Halifax International Airport Authorities data analytics journey, from early struggles to building a data culture that leverages predictive analytics and AI.
